byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: The nation turned away from discord over the vote to leave the European Union to mark the 100th anniversary of the bloody World War I battle.

headline.print_headline: Britons Set Aside Rancor to Honor Thousands Killed in Battle of the Somme
headline.main: Britons Put Rancor Aside to Commemorate the Battle of the Somme

snippet: The nation turned away from discord over the vote to leave the European Union to mark the 100th anniversary of the bloody World War I battle....
abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron joins French Pres Francois Hollande at Thiepval Memorial in northern France to pay respect to dead of Battle of Somme on its 100th anniversary; ceremony offers counterpoint to vote by Britain to exit European Union at time when concept of European union is strained.
